name: Psychophilia
description:
Psychophilia is a story about an ordinary guy named Victor, who has chosen the wrong path in his life.

All the action takes place in the main character's head. His thoughts are incoherent and surreal, but he can't do anything about it.

The meaningless stream of consciousness in his head, when properly considered, becomes meaningful. After realizing everything that is going on, it gets really creepy.

Psychophilia is a story where the main enemy is the player himself, a story about fighting your own inner demons in a dark and oppressive atmosphere.

In the role of the player you wade through your own mind, which generates images that are impossible in real life, read mysterious hard-to-explain dialogues and immerse yourself in an atmosphere of nightmare.
